channel.title: Admin commands
channel.description: can anyone just tell me few of the admin commands to boost peoples and my own stats and to spawn phats and stuff like that for testscape source. thx[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 05:01:50 PM[/size][hr]som1 pls help

@samuraiblood2 wrote:

go to client.java in your testscape folder it should only say client open it with notepad search(ctrl+f) for else if (command.startsWith(" it might be a little bit diffrent…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 05:45:27 PM[/size][hr]then add all the codes you want there under the last } you see

item.title: Admin commands
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

this one is better else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxall") && playerRights >= 2) { for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) addSkillXP(500000000, i); sendMessage("What a cheating noob =P"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Admin commands
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

heres stats command

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxme") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(472986434, 0); addSkillXP(472986434, 1); addSkillXP(472986434, 2); addSkillXP(472986434, 3); addSkillXP(472986434, 4); addSkillXP(472986434, 5); addSkillXP(472986434, 6); addSkillXP(472986434, 7); addSkillXP(472986434, 8); addSkillXP(472986434, 9); addSkillXP(472986434, 10); addSkillXP(472986434, 11); addSkillXP(472986434, 12); addSkillXP(472986434, 13); addSkillXP(472986434, 14); addSkillXP(472986434, 15); addSkillXP(472986434, 16); addSkillXP(472986434, 17); addSkillXP(472986434, 18); addSkillXP(472986434, 19); addSkillXP(472986434, 20); addSkillXP(472986434, 21); addSkillXP(472986434, 22); addSkillXP(472986434, 23); addSkillXP(472986434, 24); }

Change the playerRights >= 1) the 1 is mods, u can change it to 2 for admins or 3 for owners

Read full topic

item.title: Admin commands
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rares") && playerRights >=2) { addItem(963,10000); addItem(1039,10000); addItem(1041,10000); addItem(1043,10000); addItem(1045,10000); addItem(1047,10000); addItem(1049,10000); addItem(1051,10000); addItem(1054,10000); addItem(1056,10000); addItem(1058,10000); addItem(1960,10000); addItem(1962,10000); addItem(982,10000); addItem(1990,10000); sendMessage("Choob, why not just buy all those?!"); }[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 05:16:34 PM[/size][hr]I made that myself awhile ago.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 05:17:10 PM[/size][hr]This is a Modification to the “barrows” command…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows") && playerRights >=2) { addItem(4709, 10000); addItem(4711, 10000); addItem(4713, 10000); addItem(4715, 10000); addItem(4717, 10000); addItem(4719, 10000); addItem(4721, 10000); addItem(4723, 10000); addItem(4725, 10000); addItem(4727, 10000); addItem(4729, 10000); addItem(4731, 10000); addItem(4733, 10000); addItem(4735, 10000); addItem(4737, 10000); addItem(4739, 10000); addItem(4740, 10000000); addItem(4746, 10000); addItem(4748, 10000); addItem(4750, 10000); addItem(4752, 10000); addItem(4754, 10000); addItem(4756, 10000); addItem(4758, 10000); addItem(4760, 10000); sendMessage("You have been Barrowed out!"); }

Enjoy

Read full topic
